comment: I am aware that this vaccine is for animals but the media makes you think it’s never been heard of before nor is there a vaccine out yet when they’ve been giving this to animals for Coronavirus even if it’s a different strain
@chucky_dub Exactly just sharing that the Corona Virus isn’t something that’s never been heard of or happened and there is a cure for it. Plus they did say this new virus came from animals
@GiNaLAA That’s not the same virus.  Coronavirus is a family of viruses, this one is novel (meaning it’s new).
